Mike Pence ( R-IN), who has become something of a dream presidential candidate for many conservative bloggers and activists, appears to be about to say that he will Howey Politics Indiana reports: U.S. Mike Pence has ruled out a run for national office and will tour the state in the next few months, informed and reliable sources tell Howey Politics Indiana. The sources say that Mike Pence has not made a final decision about a run for governor, keeping open the option of running for reelection in the 6th CD. National Journal got in touch with Mike Pence 's mother, who predicted that he would make an announcement tomorrow-- though she would not say just what the announcement would in fact be. I'd give Congressman Mike Pence much more credit than that. He can be a good governor. Good governors are powerful. GOP presidential hopefuls( Tim Pawlenty , Newt Gingrich , and Mike Pence ) told The Wall Street Journal today that they opposed any lifting of the debt ceiling by Congress unless it was accompanied by strict spending cuts. Let's call their bluff, enthused Tim Pawlenty . But it's striLarry King how much less excited the Republican leadership in Congress sounds about a staredown with the White House. Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102. This was a big win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said.`` Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us.
